 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דְּאָבוֺן‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==faintness, languishing==, construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְכִלְיוֺן עֵינַיִם וְַדאֲבוֺן נָ֑פֶשׁ‎</span> [[Deut.28.65|Deut 28:65]] (compare [[Lev.26.16|Lev 26:16]] &amp; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דוב‎</span>).
